author: epalencia
body:
This PR includes a flag to duplicate the tkMuonGMT collection which degrades the quality flag of those muons without an associated SA muon. This is a temporary fix until we re-optimize the ID to further control rate.

The corresponding PR in the cms-l1t-offline IB is https://github.com/cms-l1t-offline/cmssw/pull/1109
title: Add flag to drop quality of low-pt TkMuons without an SA match
